p: When oral administration of the artemether showed an increase in neurotoxicity and mortality compared with the aqueous suspension, ED 50 = 150 mg/kg/day. These results indicated that once-daily oral administration of artesunate or artemether is relatively safe, presumably because the CNS is exposed transiently, whereas regular introduction either from depot i.m. injection of an oil-based drug or constant oral intake carries produces higher neurotoxic potential (Nontprasert et al. 2000).
